# og-card

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description                        | Type     | Default     |
| -------- | --------- | ---------------------------------- | -------- | ----------- |
| `name`   | `name`    | The title for this card (optional) | `string` | `undefined` |


## CSS Custom Properties

| Name                              | Description                             | Default Value |
| --------------------------------- | --------------------------------------- | ------------- |
| `--og-card-BackgroundColor`       | Overall background color of the card    | --OG-COLOR-SHADE--0--80 |
| `--og-card-BorderColor`           | Border color of the cards border        | - |
| `--og-card-BorderRadius`          | Border radius of the cards border       | --OG-BORDER-RADIUS |
| `--og-card-BorderWidth`           | Border width of the cards border        | --OG-BORDER-WIDTH |
| `--og-card-BoxShadow`             | Box shadow of the card                  | - |
| `--og-card-Margin`                | Margin around the card                  | - |
| `--og-card__content-Padding`      | Padding of the cards content            | - |
| `--og-card__footer-Padding`       | Padding of the cards footer             | - |
| `--og-card__header-BorderColor`   | Boder color of the cards header border  | --OG-COLOR-SHADE--100--60 |
| `--og-card__header-BorderStyle`   | Boder style of the cards header border  | - |
| `--og-card__header-BorderWidth`   | Boder width of the cards header border  | - |
| `--og-card__header-FontSize`      | Font size of the cards header           | - |
| `--og-card__header-FontWeight`    | Font weight of the cards header         | --OG-FONT-WEIGHT--MEDIUM |
| `--og-card__header-Margin`        | Margin of the cards header              | - |
| `--og-card__header-Padding`       | Padding of the cards header             | - |
| `--og-card__header-TextTransform` | Text transformation of the cards header | - |
